statements: SELECT * FROM user_performance
SELECT user_id, quiz_score FROM user_performance WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT user_id, course_id FROM user_performance WHERE quiz_score >= 80
SELECT * FROM user_performance WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT course_id, quiz_score FROM user_performance ORDER BY quiz_score DESC
SELECT * FROM user_performance WHERE quiz_score > 80;
SELECT user_id, course_id, quiz_score FROM user_performance WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id), AVG(quiz_score) FROM user_performance GROUP BY course_id HAVING AVG(quiz_score) > 70;
SELECT user_id, course_id, quiz_score FROM user_performance WHERE quiz_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY quiz_score ASC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, MIN(quiz_score) AS lowest_score, MAX(quiz_score) AS highest_score FROM user_performance GROUP BY user_id, course_id;
SELECT * FROM user_performance_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, score FROM user_performance_data WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM financial_courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_performance_data WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_courses WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, score, completion_status FROM user_performance_data WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_courses WHERE course_duration > 5 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, score FROM user_performance_data WHERE score >= 80 AND completion_status = true;
SELECT * FROM user_performance_data u INNER JOIN financial_courses f ON u.course_id = f.course_id WHERE u.score < 50;
SELECT course_name, course_duration, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM financial_courses;
SELECT * FROM user_performance_data;
SELECT user_id, performance_score FROM user_performance_data ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, completion_status FROM user_performance_data WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_details WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, completion_status, performance_score FROM user_performance_data WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description, instructor_name FROM course_details WHERE course_name LIKE 'SQL%' ORDER BY course_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, SUM(performance_score) AS total_performance FROM user_performance_data GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, course_name, performance_score FROM user_profiles JOIN user_performance_data ON user_profiles.user_id = user_performance_data.user_id JOIN course_details ON user_performance_data.course_id = course_details.course_id ORDER BY user_id, performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress_percentage, last_updated FROM course_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM course_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT user_id, course_id, quiz_scores, final_score FROM user_performance;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, course_id, score FROM user_performance WHERE score > 80;
SELECT user_id, completed FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 2 AND course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT course_name, description FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
